body:
Hi guys, I´m Nova,
I have a problem, i don´t know why I can´t see my PvP Stats on the avic Page..
Please help me... Im on FS :l
Thanks :)
body_tagged:

title: I don´t know why I can´t see my stats..help

replies.body:
For newer players, I don't think they work.
You could do http://www.avicus.net/NovaLikesPvP/stats
It's less good looking, but it gives you the info.
replies.body_tagged:
For newer players, I don't think they work.
You could do http://www.avicus.net/NovaLikesPvP/stats
It's less good looking, but it gives you the info.

replies.body: i think its becuase ivy code is sorta changing the leaderboard data base thing goes to ID's now instead of names like old avicus player. this is only happening to new players in preparation for the new name changing system

replies.body:
Send your player reports here: http://avicus.net/forums?topic_id=47
Just create a topic and post it. Only staff members will be able to view your report, so you don't have to worry about others looking at it.

And sorry if I sound like a moderator, I just like helping people .-.

replies.body: It turns out, when you do avicus.net/username/stats, you only see the pvp stats -_- you dont see the server activity stuff
